title: S3 (G4 Last Season) Jungle Main  LF Active Team.
body: Looking for an active team that plays at least 2-3 games a night. Not worried about team or player rank but would prefer a Silver team with players between Silver 5 and Gold. Just looking to earn End of Season rewards and the Ward skin as well as some fun times with new people. I wont reply to this post so if you are looking to contact me just add me and message me in game, I can use all chat sources (TS3, Skype, Curse Voice ect).
